mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, USERID, TITLE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, BBSID, FILENAME, NICKNAME, AVATAR FROM SC_NOTICE, SC_USER WHERE SC_NOTICE.USERID=SC_USER.ID ORDER BY SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_NOTICE(SEQ, USERID, TITLE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, BBSID, FILENAME, REGDATE) VALUES (SC_NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{readcount}, #{bbsid}, #{filename}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE, REGDATE FROM ( SELECT SEQ, TITLE, REGDATE, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS RNK FROM SC_NOTICE) WHERE RNK='1'

SELECT USERID, SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, READCOUNT, REGDATE, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM SC_USER WHERE ID = USERID) NICKNAME FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, USERID, SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, FILENAME, READCOUNT, REGDATE
FROM SC_NOTICE ORDER BY SEQ DESC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
